Pre-Game Insights: Camilo Vargas and Colombia continue their path to the 2026 World Cup, facing Bolivia as visitors on October 10th, 2024, at the Estadio Municipal del Alto.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at 14:00 hours, Mexico City time, and will be followed by a visit to Chile on October 15th, 2024.
Others: Camilo Vargas has been called up by the Colombian national team for the October FIFA date, where they will face two Conmebol qualifying matches for the 2026 World Cup.
